title: Cocktail Ball And Tray, ca. 1935
dimensions: Overall: 8 x 16  diameter cm (3 1/8 x 6 5/16 in.)
description: Ball-shaped appetizer holder, pierced to accept tooth picks, with pink rubber foot ring; fits on small circular tray with wide rim.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cocktail Ball And Tray, ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Chrome-plated metal, rubber. Gift of Mel Byars. 1991-59-148-a,b.
